definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Their claims will be fervently denied.
sentences.chinese: 他們的要求將遭到嚴詞拒絕。

sentences.english: Top officials have strongly rejected both claims.
sentences.chinese: 政府高級官員嚴詞否認了利沃夫的上述兩個說法。

sentences.english: Is being bad didn't daytime Shi day, the righteousness of foreign guy an face just strict phrase.
sentences.chinese: 只差沒有指天誓日的，外國佬一臉的義正嚴詞。
